text: Is it possible to automatically add a UI extension card to the page layout on the contact record page when a Marketplace app is installed, instead of requiring the user to drag and drop it into the page layout?

We have issues submitting an update to our listing. We get the following error message:
Anyone know what to do?

Hi <@U081VHNFK17> :wave:
It's my understanding that this is not currently possible. The given user must manually add the UI Extension App Card to the given view(s).

Hey <@U05F44JQBH7> :wave:
There have been some changes recently in this space. By chance, are you trying to set the "Install button URL" to the HubSpot App Install URL? Or are you linking to a page on the domain linked to your app?
